Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have started a carrer save and mission control gave me the task to land on the mun.

Said and done.

Now my problem starts. I haven't unlocked the 2nd tier research building and mission control suggest to go to Pol next.

What?!? Shouldn't Minmus come next?

Well now I get besides the standart test/ferry contracts always flyby/putflag/orbit/land Pol.

I really havn't got the rescourses for Pol.

Is there a way to reset the Mission Control or do you have any ideas what I should do?

Please help ... !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T12:07:01Z" title="04/29/2015 12:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by blspblackdeath**
Ignore it. The reason it pops up is because there is a Flag Pole biome and it's not recognizing that it exists. You should have a Minmus contract (Unless you've already been there)
Thats the problem I don't get a a Minmus contract.

There's no guarantee that you'll get a contract for any particular body in the game; it's all based on what the game thinks you can do. Which unfortunately seems to be calculated by your tech level and doesn't factor in the tier of your buildings.

You don't however have to accept the Pol mission. Keep doing other contracts in Kerbin's SOI and sooner or later something will appear around Minmus. It may not be 'explore Minmus', it may be a satellite or a temperature measurement or something else of the ilk.

If you're at the end of your tether with it - hit alt-f12, and add some exploration contracts until you get one for Minmus.
Well thank you, I will try that.
